Question
========
Signs of work stress can range from harmless to life-threatening. Some characteristics and signs of work stress include loss of sense of humor, loss of concentration, impatience, and hostility. Impatience characteristics of men with work stress from different occupational sectors are compared. 

![](uu-Post-hoc-test-804-nl-graph01.jpg)

The result of the test is that there are significant differences between the five different occupational branches (p < .001). A post hoc test was performed to see TRUE differences. Between which of the pairs of occupational branches below is the difference in mean impatience score significant?

Answerlist
----------
* Education vs. Entrepreneurs
* Agriculture vs. Manufacturing
* Construction vs. Agriculture
* Entrepreneurs vs. Construction
